data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Meeting Of Board Of Directors Of Mangal Electrical Industries Limited
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 33 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations
and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 (the Listing Regulations) this is to inform you that
the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i.e. Wednesday January 28 2026 has
inter alia considered and approved the Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone) of the Company for
the quarter and nine months ended December 31 2025 (the Financial Results) as recommended by
the Audit Committee.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Prior Intimation Of Board Meeting Under SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015
data.news_body: Mangal Electrical Industries Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 28/01/2026 inter alia to consider and approve the unaudited financial results of the company for the quarter ended December 31 2025.

data.descriptor: Appointment of Company Secretary / Compliance Officer
data.caption: Appointment of Company Secretary and Compliance Officer
data.news_body: Intimation under Regulation 30 read with Regulation 6(1) of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015- Appointment of Company Secretary and Compliance Officer

data.caption:
Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Meeting Of Board Of Directors Of Mangal Electrical Industries Limited (The
Company)
data.news_body:
1. Considered and approved appointment of Mr. Naresh Kumar Sharma (ICSI Membership No. A12005) as
Company Secretary and Compliance Officer (Whole Time Key Managerial Personnel) of the Company.
2. Authorised Mr. Naresh Kumar Sharma Company Secretary and Compliance Officer in addition to existing
authorized person(s) for the purpose of determining the materiality of an event or information and for making the
disclosures of material event or information to the Stock Exchange(s).
3. Considered and approved appointment of Mr. Mohit Vyas as Chief Legal Officer (Senior Management
Personnel) of the Company.

data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Mangal Electrical Industries Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from August 28 2025 the equity shares of Mangal Electrical Industries Ltd (Scrip Code: 544492) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20250826-41 dated August 26 2025.
